'''20w16a''' is the twelfth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on April 15, 2020,<ref name="20w16a">{{snap|20w16a|April 15, 2020}}</ref> which adds [[bastion remnant]]s, [[ruined portal]]s, [[Iron Chain|chain]]s, and a new [[music disc]].

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Chain (UD) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Iron Chain|Chain]]s'''
* Generate in [[bastion remnant]]s and ruined portals.
* Crafted using 2 iron nuggets and 1 iron ingot in a vertical line formation.
* Texture connects to those of the lantern and its soul variant.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Music Disc Pigstep JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Music disc]]s'''
* Added the "[[Pigstep]]" music disc, composed by [[Lena Raine]].
** Can only be found in bastion remnants.
** Has a red disc color instead of black.
** When played in a [[jukebox]], a [[redstone comparator]] output produces a signal strength of 13.

=== World generation ===
'''{{Animate|Bastion Remnant 1.png; Bastion Remnant 2.png; Bastion Remnant 3.png; Bastion Remnant 4.png|32px}} [[Bastion remnant]]s'''
* Generate in all [[Nether]] biomes, except [[basalt deltas]].
* Four types of structures generate: bridge, hoglin stables, housing units, treasure room.
* Are the only source of the "Pigstep" music disc and piglin banner pattern.
* [[Piglin]]s and [[hoglin]]s spawn here.
* [[Monster Spawner|Spawner]]s that spawn [[magma cube]]s can be found in bastion remnants.
* A [[barrier]] block was accidentally left in the treasure room type.

'''{{Animate|Overworld portal 1.png; Nether portal 1.png; Overworld Giant portal 1.png; Nether Giant portal 1.png|32px}} [[Ruined portal]]s'''
* Shattered remains of [[nether portal]]s.
* Generate in the [[Overworld]] and the Nether.
* Can be buried underground or underwater.
* A loot chest can be found beside the portal.

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added new <code>[[Tag#item creeper_drop_music_discs|creeper_drop_music_discs]]</code> item tag.
** Contains all music discs except "Pigstep".
** Used to determine what music discs creepers can drop.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Chiseled nether bricks]]'''
* Changed the texture of this block; the center now more closely resembles a skeleton or wither skeleton skull.

'''[[Crying obsidian]] and [[obsidian]]'''
* Can now be found in [[ruined portal]]s and [[bastion remnant]] loot chests, making crying obsidian obtainable without [[bartering]].

'''[[Gilded blackstone]]'''
* Can now be found in bastions, making it obtainable in Survival.

'''[[Jigsaw block]]s'''
* Added a button in the GUI that generates a jigsaw structure starting from the jigsaw block, using a given generation depth.

'''[[Quartz bricks]]'''
* Changed texture of the block; the bottom row of bricks has been shifted to the right about {{frac|1|4}} of a block.

'''[[Structure block]]s'''
* Expanded the maximum size per axis from 32 to 48.

=== Items ===
'''[[Banner pattern]]s'''
* The [[piglin]] banner pattern can now be found in bastions, making it obtainable in Survival.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Biome]]s'''
* Increased the amount of [[lava]] pools found in [[basalt deltas]].

=== General ===
'''Miscellaneous'''
* Added a JMX MBean to monitor dedicated server tick times.{{more info|What is it?}}

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Changed the <code>music_discs</code> item tag to use the <code>[[Tag#items creeper_drop_music_discs|creeper_drop_music_discs]]</code> item tag and the Pigstep music disc.
